claim: John McCain adheres to conservative principles.
premise_source_doc_sentence: John Sidney McCain III  (  born August 29 , 1936  )  is an American politician who currently serves as the senior United States Senator from Arizona .

claim: John McCain adheres to conservative principles.
premise_source_doc_sentence: While generally adhering to conservative principles , McCain at times has had a media reputation as a `` maverick '' for his willingness to disagree with his party on certain issues .

claim: John McCain adheres to conservative principles.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After being investigated and largely exonerated in a political influence scandal of the 1980s as a member of the Keating Five , he made campaign finance reform one of his signature concerns , eventually gaining passage of the McCain -- Feingold Act in 2002 .

claim: John McCain adheres to conservative principles.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is also known for his work in the 1990s to restore diplomatic relations with Vietnam , and for his belief that the Iraq War should have been fought to a successful conclusion .

claim: John McCain adheres to conservative principles.
premise_source_doc_sentence: McCain has chaired the Senate Commerce Committee , opposed spending that he considered to be pork barrel , and played a key role in alleviating a crisis over judicial nominations with the bi-partisan group known as the Gang of 14 .

claim: John McCain adheres to conservative principles.

premise_source_doc_sentence: The family known in the media as the `` black McCains '' are the living descendants of Isom McCain  (  1831 -- btw 1888 and 1890  )  and Leddie McCain , African-American slaves owned in Teoc , Mississippi , by William Alexander McCain , a cotton plantation owner who was the great-great-grandfather of Senator John McCain .
